interestName.description: A brief name or label for this strategic interest.

region.description: Geographic location or name of the area containing the strategic interest (e.g., Persian Gulf, Arctic Circle).

resourceType.description: Describes the primary resource or asset (e.g., oil fields, rare earth metals, shipping lane).

importanceLevel.description: The overall strategic priority assigned to this interest.

controllingEntities.description: List of nations, corporations, or groups currently controlling or administering the strategic interest.

rivalClaims.description: List of nations or entities that dispute or claim this interest.

strategicValue.description: Narrative summary of why this location or resource is strategically important (e.g., major shipping route, nuclear launch site).

potentialConflicts.description: Possible conflicts or tensions arising from this interest (e.g., references to conflict events, alliances).

economicValue.description: Estimated monetary value tied to the resource (if applicable, e.g., $300 billion).

environmentalConcerns.description: Description of environmental impact or sustainability issues (if relevant).
